helloSection.name: I'm Patryk
helloSection.description: I'm a software engineer specializing in FinTech, SaaS, business applications, mobile apps, and system architecture. I'm also a programming student. Outside of work, I dedicate my free time to ambitious personal projects, striving to become a native-level English speaker, and continuously enhancing my skills in Java (Spring Boot). ðŸš€
helloSection.scrollHint: scroll down to know me better

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.description: I am a skilled software engineer with expertise in React (Next.js), and React Native, as well as backend development with Java (Spring Boot). I specialize in building efficient, scalable, and high-performance solutions that ensure seamless user experiences. With a strong problem-solving mindset and keen attention to detail, I strive to create innovative and maintainable software. Known for my ability to learn quickly and collaborate effectively with teams, I am dedicated to delivering high-impact applications that drive real value.

jobs.subtitle: What I have done so far
jobs.title: Work Experience

CodeNauts.title: Software Engineer
CodeNauts.description: At CodeNauts, I specialize in developing business-oriented applications, including SaaS, FinTech, and Business Intelligence (BI) solutions, using React, Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, SCSS, Java (Spring Boot), Expo, and React Native. My work is focused on delivering advanced, scalable, and high-performance systems tailored to modern business needs by leveraging cutting-edge technologies and innovative solutions.I am committed to building intuitive and maintainable software that enhances efficiency, optimizes workflows, and drives digital transformation. With a strong problem-solving mindset and a passion for continuous learning, I strive to create impactful applications that empower businesses to grow and succeed. Additionally, I actively support junior developers, helping them overcome challenges and grow their skills. ðŸš€

Nanovo.title: Frontend Engineer
Nanovo.description: During my internship, I worked on a web page for a beauty salonâ€”nothing too complex, just a simple project to get some hands-on experience. I focused on making it responsive, adding some basic interactivity with JavaScript, and fixing minor front-end issues. It wasn't rocket science, but hey, everyone starts somewhere! ðŸ’…ðŸš€

Ignatianum.title: Network Administrator
Ignatianum.description: During my internship, I was responsible for setting up, configuring, and maintaining network hardware, including routers, switches, firewalls, and wireless access points. I assisted users with network-related issues, troubleshooting connectivity problems, and providing technical support. Additionally, I maintained detailed documentation of network topology, configurations, and procedures to ensure efficient management and smooth operations.

technologies.title: Technologies
technologies.hint: *Technologies are listed in order of proficiency, from highest to lowest.

projects.description: The projects presented here are older works that don't fully reflect my current skill level, but they're still worth showcasing. They were initially created to demonstrate my abilities while seeking my first job. Each project includes a brief summary and links to the respective code repositories. Since then, I've significantly improved and am now working on more advanced and refined projectsâ€”stay tuned for updates!

BoredApeClub.description: BoredApeClub is a web application that enables users to explore and engage with Bored Ape Yacht Club (BAYC) NFTs. It features a seamless, user-friendly interface with smooth animations for browsing, searching, and interacting with the BAYC collection.

Finance.description: FinanceApp is a finance application that allows users to simulate the buying and selling of stocks from top global companies. It features real-time market data, an intuitive interface, and interactive charts to enhance the trading experience.

Collective.description: Collective is an e-commerce web application that allows users to buy and sell clothing. It offers a comprehensive platform for exploring fashion collections, with detailed product information, a user-friendly interface for browsing and searching, and a seamless way to connect with the fashion community.

ClinicPatientDashboard.description: This full-stack application serves as a  admin panel that streamlines the management of client data. It features a clean, modern interface that allows administrators to efficiently add, remove, edit, and search for clients.This was a challenging task, as I had to complete it within just a few days to qualify for an internship. In the end, I got the internship, but ironically, they reached out just a few days too lateâ€”by then, I had already secured a job at Codenauts!
